name: Christian Life Fellowship
description: Church providing a food pantry for eligible Knox County residents. Offers food assistance to individuals and families in need through their food distribution program.
source: Verified from Google search results and multiple food bank directories
notes: Food pantry is accessible for those with disabilities. Part of the Christian Life Food Bank network serving the Barbourville area. Rated 5.0 out of 5 stars with 6 Google reviews.
